ygData.subject: Re: Gnome Necros
ygData.msgSnippet: Bonuses on WHAT, I know clerics get them for undead, also when fighting undead I seem to go up faster too.  Maybe he is talking about race bonuses but those
ygData.messageBody:
Bonuses on WHAT, I know clerics get them for undead, also when fighting
undead I seem to go up faster too. Maybe he is talking about race bonuses
but those don't apply to Exp.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: AshcroftJT@... [SMTP:AshcroftJT@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 10, 1999 5:23 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Gnome Necros

From: AshcroftJT@...

In a message dated 6/10/99 3:34:12 PM EST, enigma@... writes:

<< The big plus of a DE is that his home city
loves him and he can go into "Evil" cities. >>


I also sawthing from someone eithier here or on necromonitor that said DE
necros get exp bonus ???

the reported guy said he heard from a GM ?


Zakrell Lu'Dan
